article_title: FTC, Pa. Can't Block Hospital Merger
article_text:
FTC, Pa. Can't Block Hospital Merger

Law360, New York (May 9, 2016, 5:07 PM ET) -- The Federal Trade Commission and Pennsylvania cannot put the merger of Penn State Hershey Medical Center and PinnacleHealth System on hold for an administrative challenge, a Pennsylvania federal judge ruled Monday, rejecting the government’s market definition and saying the merger could benefit patients.



The FTC had argued against the merger, saying it would harm health care competition in the region. (Credit: Law360) U.S. District Judge John E. Jones III denied the enforcers a preliminary injunction following a hearing on the likely competitive effects of the merger....

To view the full article, register now.
